props.description: Setting v-model to true shows collapsible element, false value hides it

Sets animation effect when showing or hiding dropdown. Valid values are: 'fade-collapse' or `empty string` to disable animations. Animation speed can be set in `--collapse-transition-duration` css variable.

slots.description: Slot for content that triggers collapse. Slot props: `isOpen`, `onTrigger`
Slot for content that is collapsed
